instructions.reason_for_call: You just created your user id mei_patel_7272 and ordered some things, but realized you might have typed your address wrong. You want to check it, and potentially correct all order addresses and your user address. After this, you'd like to check the jigsaw you ordered, and if it's not shipped yet, you want to change it to the easiest jigsaw (easiest level, least pieces) because your kid is too young. By default you use PayPal.
instructions.known_info: Your name is Mei Patel, and you live in 445 Maple Drive, Suite 394, Fort Worth, Texas, 76165.
instructions.unknown_info: You do not remember your email address
instructions.task_instructions: You are brief and your memory is not too good sometimes, but you are polite.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hello! I recently created a user ID, mei_patel_7272, and placed some orders. I think I might have entered my address incorrectly. Could you help me check and possibly update the address for my user profile and all my orders? Also, I ordered a jigsaw puzzle, and if it hasn't shipped yet, I'd like to change it to the easiest one available because my kid is quite young. I usually pay with PayPal.

message.content: Hello! I recently created a user ID, mei_patel_7272, and placed some orders. I think I might have entered my address incorrectly. Could you help me check and possibly update the address for my user profile and all my orders? Also, I ordered a jigsaw puzzle, and if it hasn't shipped yet, I'd like to change it to the easiest one available because my kid is quite young. I usually pay with PayPal.

messages.content:
{
  "type": "message",
  "text": "Thanks — I can help with that. Before I can make or suggest any changes I need to locate and authenticate your account. Please provide either (A) the email you used for the account, or (B) your full name and ZIP code. I also need the correct address you want set as your default (address1, address2 if any, city, state, country, zip).

A few important notes so you know what will happen next:
- I will look up your user profile and list your recent orders so you can tell me which orders should get the address update. I can only modify shipping addresses for orders that are still pending; delivered or processed orders cannot have their shipping address changed.
- For each pending order I find, I’ll show the order id and current status and ask you to confirm (yes) before I update the address on that order and/or on your profile.
- You mentioned a jigsaw puzzle swap: please tell me which order contains the puzzle (order id) or I can identify it after I pull up your orders. If the puzzle’s order is still pending I can change the puzzle item to another available item of the same product (only to other variants of the same product). If it’s already delivered or processed, we can only do an exchange/return per the policy. I’ll need you to confirm the exact new item you want (or I can show the easiest available variants once I see the product details).
- You said you usually pay with PayPal — that’s fine; if any modification requires a payment method change I’ll show the available methods on your account and ask you to confirm before proceeding.

Please provide either your email or your full name + ZIP, plus the new address you want saved. If you already know the order id for the jigsaw puzzle, include that too."
}

messages.content:
Verify the following before outputting ###STOP###:

1. GOAL SATISFIED: The scenario instruction goal is fully satisfied (the customer's request has been completed as specified in your scenario).

2. NO PENDING EXECUTION: The agent has no pending action to perform. If the agent said they would do something (e.g. cancel an order, process a return), wait until they have confirmed it is done or you have seen the outcome. Do not stop while the agent might still be about to execute something.

3. CORRECT TERMINATION TYPE: You are ending because the task is complete. If you are being transferred to a human, use ###TRANSFER### instead. If the scenario does not provide enough information to continue, use ###OUT-OF-SCOPE### instead.

Only if all checks pass, output ###STOP### in your next message. If any check fails, continue the conversation (e.g. thank the agent and wait, or ask for confirmation).
###STOP###
